treatment-md.title: Bythotrephes transcaucasicus Behning 1941
treatment-md.article-title: Redescription of Bythotrephes arcticus Lilljeborg, 1901 (Crustacea: Cladocera: Onychopoda) and confirmation of an independent species status of the distant Transcaucasian populations of the genus Bythotrephes Leydig
